attributes.action: Improve & implement mandatory security for all clubs and bars to prevent spiking
attributes.additional_details: Many people (especially women) are being put in extreme, life altering danger (HIV infections through dirty needles). Also, the use of these drugs themselves can be highly dangerous and destressing to the victims. Furthermore, the drugs can be used to facilitate sexual assault or even rape.
attributes.background: Improve prevention of being drugged on a night out by increasing obligatory, thorough searches before the entry into bars and nightclubs. Also, additional training should be crucial for staff to aid victims of these attacks.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Make it a legal requirement for nightclubs to thoroughly search guests on entry:
